# ShopSmart

> AI-powered e-commerce platform with intelligent inventory management and demand forecasting.

ShopSmart is a full-stack e-commerce platform that combines modern shopping with AI-driven analytics. Built with React, Node.js, and Python ML services.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://shopsmart.com/): Featured products and main navigation
- [Products](https://shopsmart.com/products): Full product catalog with search, category filters, and sorting
- [Product Detail](https://shopsmart.com/products/{id}): Individual product pages with pricing, stock info, and add to cart
- [Cart](https://shopsmart.com/cart): Shopping cart with checkout
- [AI Dashboard](https://shopsmart.com/dashboard): AI-powered demand prediction and stock alerts
- [Analytics](https://shopsmart.com/analytics): Business analytics with revenue, orders, and customer insights

## API

- Base URL: `/api`
- Documentation: `/api/docs` (Swagger/OpenAPI)
- Authentication: JWT Bearer tokens
- Product API: `GET /api/products` - paginated product listing with filters
- Categories: `GET /api/categories` - all product categories

## Product Categories

Electronics, Clothing, Books, Home & Garden, Sports

## Features

- Product search and filtering by category, price, name
- Shopping cart with quantity management
- User authentication and order management
- AI demand prediction per product
- Stock level monitoring with alerts
- Business analytics dashboard (revenue, top products, customer insights)
- PostHog behavioral analytics integration
